import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Modal, Carousel, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faSortDown, faSortUp } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Header, ReadMore, Footer, BasicSlider, DropDown, ProgressiveLoader, ScrollButton, VideoPlayer, ModalSlider } from '../../components'; import { arrows_gold, msg_sm, cyclope_eye, big_blue_smoke, big_red_smoke, play_icon, } from '../../assets/images'; import { settings, slides, sepData, doteData, hantuData, mData, simonData, camapData, chomucData, slide5, sep_img3, sep_thumbnail1, } from './Data'; const options = ["English", "Tamil", "Hindi"]; function InProduction() { const [selectedOption, setSelectedOption] = useState(); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [isVideo, setisVideo] = useState(null); const [source, setsource] = useState(null); const dropref = useRef(); useEffect(() => { document.title = "In Production | PlanerTota"; }); const handleClose = (value) => setShow(value); const loadModal = (value, x) => { setsource(value); setisVideo(x); setShow(true); } const onOptionClicked = (value) => { setSelectedOption(value); }; return ( <>
